title: The Red Rocks: Part One
description: Five friends live in a makeshift camp of abandoned RVâ€™s after red rocks decimated their hometowns. Food scavenged from a deserted grocery store will last for only so long and they are under the constant threat of attacking gnomes. Other than that, they live comfortably and have no knowledge of the outside world.Until Amber finds a red rock and they have to make a quick Stay and face the rocks and certain destruction or leave.Will they have the courage to leave their home behind and find a place untouched by the rocks? This is the 18,000 word first part of a serialized novel.
author: E.M. Noble
